info.title: Sparrow Air API
info.description: API for Sparrow Air airline management system

get.description: Returns a list of all aircraft ✈️

get.summary: Parse online aircraft data by ICAO code

get.description: Returns an aircraft ✈️ by ICAO code

get.summary: Get all aircraft in the fleet
get.description: Returns a list of all aircraft in the fleet

post.summary: Create a new aircraft in the fleet
post.description: Creates a new aircraft in the fleet

get.summary: Get all aircraft of a specific type
get.description: Returns a list of all aircraft of a specific type

parameters.name: aircraftTypeIcao
parameters.description: ICAO code of the aircraft type

get.summary: Get all aircraft for a specific airline
get.description: Returns a list of all aircraft for a specific airline

get.summary: Get total aircraft count for a specific airline
get.description: Returns the total number of aircraft for a specific airline
Returns an aircraft by ID

put.summary: Update an existing aircraft in the fleet
put.description: Updates an existing aircraft in the fleet

delete.summary: Delete an aircraft from the fleet
delete.description: Deletes an aircraft from the fleet

get.description: Returns a list of all new airlines ✈️🌍. Supports pagination with optional 'page' and 'size' query parameters.
Returns a list of airlines with the specified active status. Supports pagination with optional 'page' and 'size' query parameters.
Returns a list of airlines in the specified country. Supports pagination with optional 'page' and 'size' query parameters.
Returns an airline with the specified ICAO code
Returns a new airline ✈️ by ID
Returns a list of all airlines
Returns an airline by ICAO code

put.description: Updates an airline by ICAO code

delete.description: Deletes an airline by ICAO code

get.description: Returns a list of all new airports ✈️🌍. Supports pagination with optional 'page' and 'size' query parameters.
Returns a list of airports in the specified country. Supports pagination with optional 'page' and 'size' query parameters.

get.summary: Calculate distance between two new airports
get.description: Returns the distance in kilometers between two new airports identified by their ICAO codes

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: ICAO code of the departure airport

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: ICAO code of the arrival airport

404.description: One or both airports not found

get.summary: Get new airport by ICAO code
get.description: Returns a new airport 🛬 by ICAO code

delete.summary: Delete new airport by ICAO code

get.description: Returns a list of all bookings
Returns a booking by ID
Returns a list of all booking segments
Returns a booking segment by ID
Returns a list of all countries 🌍
Returns a list of countries with names similar to the provided name
Returns a country by its ISO code
Returns a list of all flights

get.summary: Get flights by airline ICAO code
get.description: Returns a list of flights by airline ICAO code

get.summary: Get all flights from a specific airport
get.description: Returns a list of flights departing from the specified airport code

get.summary: Get all flights to a specific airport
get.description: Returns a list of flights arriving at the specified airport code
Returns a flight by ID

get.summary: Get airport to airports flights mapping
get.description: Returns a mapping of departure airports to their destination airports
Returns a mapping of airports to their flights
Returns a list of flights that form a route between the specified departure and arrival airports

parameters.name: departure
parameters.description: ICAO code of the departure airport

parameters.name: arrival
parameters.description: ICAO code of the arrival airport

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid parameters

get.summary: Get minimum cost route between two airports
get.description: Returns a list of flights that form the minimum cost route between the specified departure and arrival airports

parameters.name: departure
parameters.description: ICAO code of the departure airport

parameters.name: arrival
parameters.description: ICAO code of the arrival airport

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid parameters

get.description: Retrieves links between airports
Returns a greeting message
Returns a list of all passengers

get.summary: Get passengers by first name and last name
get.description: Returns a list of passengers by first name and last name

get.summary: Get passengers by date of birth
get.description: Returns a list of passengers by date of birth

parameters.name: dateOfBirth
parameters.description: Date of birth of the passenger

get.description: Returns a passenger by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the passenger to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the passenger to delete

get.description: Returns a list of all seats

get.summary: Get seats by airline ICAO and flight number
get.description: Returns a list of seats by airline ICAO and flight number
Returns a list of seats by flight number

parameters.name: flightNumber
parameters.description: Flight number to fetch seats for

get.description: Returns a list of seats by flight ID

parameters.name: flightId
parameters.description: ID of the flight to fetch seats for

get.description: Returns a seat by ID

parameters.name: seatId
parameters.description: ID of the seat to be fetched

parameters.name: seatId
parameters.description: ID of the seat to be updated
